creator: About Fun
descriptionHtml:
WarFriends Legends is an exhilarating, one-handed, real-time multiplayer portrait shooter packed with diverse heroes, epic abilities, and intense game modes. Engage in battles across various maps using a vast arsenal of weapons, booster cards, and gadgets. Experience thrilling PvP and PvE combat, diving into strategic action anytime, anywhere! If you're a fan of Battle Royale, Survival, or any other action games, don’t hesitate—download this game where every battle is unique. You’ll love it!

FEATURES:
- Over 5 Game Modes: PvP and PvE options, including Battle Royale, Co-op, and more.
- 15+ Unique Heroes: Unlock, upgrade, and master a roster of powerful characters.
- Varied NPC Enemies: Face hideous zombies, sneaky flamethrowers, and dangerous spider-bot bosses.
- Abilities & Perks: Utilize a plethora of active and passive abilities and upgradeable, game-changing perks.
- Arsenal of Weapons: Equip cool-looking weapons like grenade launchers, SMGs, and sniper rifles.
- Lootable Gadgets: Gain an edge in every battle with a variety of gadgets.
- Rogue-like Upgrading: Enhance your strategy with in-battle upgrades.
- Booster Collection: Collect and upgrade boosters for powerful effects.
- Customization Options: Personalize your experience with skins, emotes, drop bots, and trails.


MULTIPLE FUN MODES
With over 5 different game modes, including PvE, PvP, and PvPvE in teams of 2 or 4, WarFriends Legends offers something for every online gaming fan. Whether you prefer cooperative or competitive play, Battle Royale, or Plunder, there’s a mode for you!

POWERFUL ELITE HEROES
Choose from powerful elite heroes, each boasting unique weapons, skills, and abilities. Whether you want to unleash a toxic cloud that poisons enemies or smash them with sharp axes, unlock and collect unique skins as you progress through the game.

FIND MIGHTY WEAPONS
With an endless array of guns to choose from, you’ll find the perfect weapon to suit your playstyle. Boost your weapons, dominate the battlefield, and become the ultimate survivor!

GET PRECIOUS LOOT
But beware—the arena is teeming with ravenous zombies and sneaky mercenaries that threaten your success. Use your shooting and battle skills to defend yourself and secure valuable loot.

EVER-CHANGING BATTLEFIELD
Experience diverse rogue-like elements, various boosters, game modifiers, and a dynamic map that changes every battle, ensuring fresh and original gameplay each time you play.

CREATE BOOSTER COMBINATIONS
Build and upgrade your booster deck with the dynamic booster system. Create mighty combinations that will leave your opponents in awe!

FUN WITH FRIENDS
Invite your friends to play DUOS or QUADROS. Team up with your buddies and take on other teams. Every party is more fun with WarFriends Legends!

BECOME A LEGEND
Master the best tactics and strategies in WarFriends Legends to become the last person standing or the one who collects the most coins. With exciting battles, shooting action, rogue-like elements, and the chance to unlock and collect rewards, heroes, and skills, WarFriends Legends is a must-play for any fan of Battle Royale, Survival, or action games. Download now and become the ultimate legend!


Discord: https://discord.com/invite/mjS4uK9SgD
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarFriendsLegends
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/warfriends_legends
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@aboutfungames
X: https://twitter.com/Legends_WF

Terms of Service: https://www.about-fun.com/tos
Privacy Policy: http://www.about-fun.com/privacy-policy
descriptionShort: Real-time multiplayer shooter with epic heroes, modes, loot and intense battles

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Hey Legends, the worldwide release is finally here! Tell your friends, grab your phones, and see you on the battlefield!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Legends,
The Thanksgiving update is here:
- Friend list added - See if your friends are online and invite them to your party directly from the list.
- Party chat added and chat improvements
- Country flags added to player profiles - Show where you are from.
- Lots of surprises for the Thanksgiving event, including new Thanksgiving skins and other cool customizations for Black Friday and Cyber Monday.
- Tons of visual and QoL improvements and bug fixes.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Legends,
S5 Holiday is here!

Jenn arrives:
- Early unlock Dec 20 (IAP+skin) or free late Jan
- Dual Pistols, double shot after pause
- Unique skins, perks, 12 boosters (4 exclusive)

6v6 Payload:
- Escort Pablo through enemy territory
- More allies = move forward
- Deliver or be closest at time end
- 2 maps in Advanced rotation

Event: Wipeout!
- 2v2/3v3/4v4 on Stadium
- Intense TDM with revives
- Limited-time

Cosmetics:
- New Drop Pods, Skins, Holiday Pass

See Discord for details!

title:
WarFriends Legends PvP Shooter
1.1.2

creator: About Fun
descriptionHtml:
WarFriends Legends: The Ultimate Brawl, Battle Royale, and Shooter Experience!

Dive into WarFriends Legends, an exhilarating, real-time online multiplayer portrait shooter where you frag foes in fast-paced action. Choose from a roster of diverse heroes—each with epic abilities—and conquer battles across multiple modes including Battle Royale, PvP, and PvE. If you’re a fan of intense shooting games, don’t hesitate—join this star-studded showdown today!

FEATURES
- Over 8 Game Modes
Brawl in PvP, co-op, and Battle Royale—find your perfect style of action!
- 15+ Unique Heroes
Unlock powerful stars with distinct weapons, skills, and customization options.
- Varied NPC Enemies
Test your shooter prowess against hideous zombies, sneaky mercenaries, and spider-bot bosses.
- Epic Abilities & Perks
Unleash active and passive powers to frag your enemies and turn the tide of battle.
- Arsenal of Weapons
From SMGs to grenade launchers, pick your favorite gun and keep shooting!
- Lootable Gadgets
Gather boosters and gear to outplay opponents in every brawl.
- Rogue-like Upgrading
Adapt on the fly with in-battle upgrades that make every match fresh and exciting.
- Booster Collection
Collect and upgrade cards to build mighty combos and dominate the arena.
- Customization Options
Stand out as the ultimate star with skins, emotes, drop bots, and trails.

MULTIPLE FUN MODES
Take on more than five different modes—PvE, PvP, and PvPvE—whether you crave cooperative play, heated competition, or classic Battle Royale. Every online multiplayer fan will find a thrilling way to frag and win!

POWERFUL ELITE HEROES
Wield unique shooting styles and epic skills to crush your rivals. Upgrade your heroes, unlock new skins, and become a star on the battlefield.

FIND MIGHTY WEAPONS
Guns galore await your expertise. Unleash relentless action and keep upgrading to secure your place as the top shooter in every brawl or battle.

GET PRECIOUS LOOT
Beware of lurking zombies and sneaky flamethrowers. Defeat them for valuable rewards and frag your way to the top!

EVER-CHANGING BATTLEFIELD
Experience an evolving arena with rogue-like boosters, modifiers, and maps that guarantee every battle feels brand new.

CREATE BOOSTER COMBINATIONS
Collect and combine boosters to craft an unstoppable deck. Dominate every brawl with strategic synergy!

FUN WITH FRIENDS
Team up in DUOS or QUADROS, coordinating tactics for ultimate online multiplayer glory. Make every match a star-studded showdown!

BECOME A LEGEND
Master the strategies, hone your shooting skills, and rise above the rest to become the last one standing. Download WarFriends Legends now and transform into the ultimate star of this brawl, battle, and royale extravaganza!

Discord: https://discord.com/invite/mjS4uK9SgD
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarFriendsLegends
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/warfriends_legends
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@aboutfungames
X: https://twitter.com/Legends_WF

Terms of Service: https://www.about-fun.com/tos
Privacy Policy: http://www.about-fun.com/privacy-policy
descriptionShort: Epic multiplayer online MOBA brawl: action battle royale shooting games w stars!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Season 6: Season of Snake
- New Epic Hero—Maverick: Wield the powerful Battle Rifle and deploy Taunt Stations to disrupt enemies.
- Time-Limited Events—Tug of War & Scavenger Hunt: Complete tasks and collect special currency to unlock exclusive rewards.
- More Customization: Tons of new skins for your heroes.
- Enhanced Gameplay: Tweaks, improvements, and fresh balance updates.
Jump in now to explore Season of Snake and claim your victories!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Season 7 - Eye Of The Storm:
- New Epic Hero—Riko: Unleash her powerful Volt Cannon and boosted Electric Traps to shock your foes.
- Limited-Time Event—Valentine’s Scavenger Hunt: Collect Hearts during battles and trade them for exclusive Valentine’s rewards.
- New Mortar Mercenary: Dangerous long range units with devastating AoE attack. Will appear as Battle Modifier.
- Enhanced Gameplay: Enjoy improved weapon accuracy, auto-aim for Dutch's Minigun Ability and other improvements and bug fixes.

EVER-CHANGING BATTLEFIELD
Experience an evolving arena with rogue-like boosters, modifiers, and maps that guarantee every battle feels brand new.

CREATE BOOSTER COMBINATIONS
Collect and combine boosters to craft an unstoppable deck. Dominate every brawl with strategic synergy!

FUN WITH FRIENDS
Team up in DUOS or QUADROS, coordinating tactics for ultimate online multiplayer glory. Make every match a star-studded showdown!

BECOME A LEGEND
Master the strategies, hone your shooting skills, and rise above the rest to become the last one standing. Download WarFriends Legends now and transform into the ultimate star of this brawl, battle, and royale extravaganza!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
WarFriends Legends 1.5 update is here!
• New Hero: Leon brings close combat in the battles
• Celebrate the Easter Event with limited-time rewards
• Season 9: Foodie features tasty events and Foodie Skins
• Bug fixes: Clan member counts, Team mode icons, Hero ghosts falling, and more
• Improvements: bigger revive text, updated chat backgrounds, balanced some Gadgets and Heroes, and more
Lead the fight now!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Ahoy, Legends—1.5.5 is live!

Season 10: Wacky Waters
• Pirate battles + boat-load of skins
• New modes: Deadly Raid, Hell Knockout, Deadly Knockout (PvE)
• New modifier: Zombie Boss
• Tug-of-War Pass for extra loot

Fixes
• Leon’s Battle-Hardened now blocks only weapon damage
• Various minor bugs squashed

QoL
• Smarter hero-weapon offers
• Ability SFX for Leon
• More optimizations & polish

Suit up and seize the seas!

title:
WarFriends Legends PvP Shooter
1.5.5
